item.description:

item.content:encoded:
Everybody Eats is a gluten-free and nut-free bakery. We created their first online store in 2006 and just re-designed and re-launched their store to kick off 2015! We also tried our hands at tabletop photography with this project and did the product photography in-house.

everybodyeats-inc.com

Client Quote

Hello guys,
Just a thank you note.
The website is working great, people love it, no BS and straight to the point!
Pedro Arroba â€“ Everybody Eats

item.title: launch: J. VanSuch Studio
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
This Brooklyn-based textile design studio specializes in print and color for womenswear fashion and accessories. Their silk scarfs are more work-of-art than trendy accessory.

The post launch: J. VanSuch Studio appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
This Brooklyn-based textile design studio specializes in print and color for womenswear fashion and accessories. Their silk scarfs are more work-of-art than trendy-accessory. Their site includes a custom online store, galleries where they can archive their collections, and a blog-style area for their textile and fine art experiments.

visit the site

The post launch: J. VanSuch Studio appeared first on mimoYmima.

item.title: myPOS
item.dc:creator: Brent Lagerman
item.description:
myPOS started out selling ‘point of sale’ replacement printers, then quickly expanded to terminals, and bar-code scanners. mimoYmima created their branding and online presence. The Mascot POS replacement printers are pretty boring so we decided to give the company an adorable mascot to liven up the site and help them connect with their customers. Online […]

The post myPOS appeared first on mimoYmima.
item.content:encoded:
myPOS started out selling ‘point of sale’ replacement printers, then quickly expanded to terminals, and bar-code scanners. mimoYmima created their branding and online presence.

The Mascot

POS replacement printers are pretty boring so we decided to give the company an adorable mascot to liven up the site and help them connect with their customers.

Online Store

The post myPOS appeared first on mimoYmima.
